events.title: Gospel Explosion 4
events.location: Bronx, New York, United States Of America
events.description: Gospel Explosion 4 will be a powerful event featuring Gospel artists, Donnie McClurkin , Jekalynn Carr, JJ Hairston, LeAndria Johnson, Zacardi Cortez, Blanca, Micah E Clark, and The Bronx Mass Choir. Pastor Dr. Essien of the Deeper Life Bible Church will deliver a powerful Word of encouragement, and WBLS Liz Black will be hosting this wonderful evening, so get your tickets today!
